articles.title: Citations Awarded to Fishery Workers and Logistic Personnel of KPA
articles.content:
Citations Awarded to Fishery Workers and Logistic Personnel of KPA
Pyongyang, December 28 (KCNA) -- A ceremony took place in the presence of supreme leader Kim Jong Un on Saturday to award the party and state commendations to exemplary officials and merited logistic personnel in the fishery field of the Korean People's Army (KPA). 
					 Kim Jong Un made a speech before the awarding ceremony. 
					
					 He gave congratulations to those honored with the party and state commendations at the building of the Workers' Party of Korea Central Committee amid the attention and envy of all sectors and units across the country. 
					
					 He noted that officials and fishermen in the fishery field of the KPA have over-fulfilled the fishing task for this year, set by the party, despite rough sea conditions, only with belief in the party and true to its call for turning the sea of the socialist country into a golden fishing ground. 
					
					 The fishing field of the KPA gave an ideological strike to the defeatists of weak faith who had complained of conditions, asserting that the sea of our country is not abundant in fish resources, he said. 
					
					 And he set the fishing goal for next year to be hit by it and the tasks for fishery stations to build up their material and technical foundations.
					
					 He kindly asked to convey his wishes for happiness to all the officials and employees in the fishery field of the KPA and their families. 
					
					 Army General Hyon Yong Chol, minister of the People's Armed Forces, read out a decree of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly on awarding the party and state commendations to the exemplary officials and merited logistic personnel in the fishery field of KPA. 
					
					 Kim Jong Un personally conferred the commendations on the exemplary officials and merited logistic personnel.
					
					 Then, he had a photo session with the participants against the building of the WPK Central Committee.
					
					 Present there were Hwang Pyong So, Hyon Yong Chol, So Hong Chan, Pak Yong Sik, Ryom Chol Song, Jo Kyong Chol and other executive members of the KPA party committee and commanding officers of services and units of corps level of the KPA.

articles.title: Art Performance Given by Agricultural Workers
articles.content:
Art Performance Given by Agricultural Workers
Pyongyang, December 28 (KCNA) -- An art performance "Let Us Sing of This Glory of Holding Marshal Kim Jong Un, greatest-ever commander, in high esteem" was given by agricultural workers at the Ryongchon Cooperative Farm in Hwangju County, North Hwanghae Province on Sunday to celebrate the third anniversary of his assumption of the supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army.
					 The performance began with poems and choruses "We Will Win Victory, Flying the Colors of the Supreme Commander" and "Joy of the People". Put on the stage were colorful numbers praising the undying feats of Kim Jong Un who is leading to victory the Songun revolutionary cause of Juche pioneered and steered by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The performers sang high praises of Kim Jong Un who is demonstrating the dignity and might of the great Paektusan nation by ushering in a new heyday of the Juche cause of army building with his noble loyalty to the leader's cause and distinguished leadership ability.
					
					 A serial songs "Let's Support Our Supreme Commander with Arms", male solo "Our Marshal" and other numbers mesmerized the audience as they reflected the ardent desire of all service personnel and people to hold Kim Jong Un in high esteem.
					
					 Among the audience were Ri Myong Gil, chairman of the Central Committee of the Union of Agricultural Workers of Korea, Ri Won Jong, secretary of the provincial committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, officials concerned, members of the union and agricultural workers in Hwangju County.

articles.title: Birthday Spread Sent to Centenarian
articles.content:
Birthday Spread Sent to Centenarian
Samchon, December 28 (KCNA) -- Marshal Kim Jong Un sent a birthday spread to centenarian Ho Pyong residing in Samchon County Town, South Hwanghae Province.
					 Ho Pyong, who was born into a poor family in Kyonggi Province in Juche 3, (1914), lost his parents in his early years during the Japanese imperialists' colonial rule over Korea and was subject to all maltreatment and contempt as day laborer.
					
					 After the liberation of Korea he lived in south Korea, looking up to the northern half of Korea as a beacon of hope. He came over to the north during the strategic temporary retreat during the past Fatherland Liberation War.
					
					 He devoted his patriotic efforts to fruit farming to repay the benevolence of the Workers' Party of Korea even a bit.
					
					 After pension he continues working, having a balanced diet and leading an optimistic life.

articles.title: Anniversary of Naming Kumgang-san Opera Troupe under Chongryon Marked
articles.content:
Anniversary of Naming Kumgang-san Opera Troupe under Chongryon Marked
Tokyo, December 27 (KNS-KCNA) -- A meeting took place at the Korean Hall in Tokyo on Dec. 25 to mark the 40th anniversary of the naming of the Kumgang-san Opera Troupe under the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon).
					 It was attended by Ho Jong Man, chairman of the Central Standing Committee of Chongryon, and its vice-chairpersons, the deputy head of the troupe, the chairman of the association for supporting the troupe, an advisor to the troupe and others.
					
					 After a decree of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK was read out, honorary titles were awarded to creators and artistes of meritorious services.
					
					 Congratulatory messages from the Ministry of Culture of the DPRK and the Phibada Opera Troupe on the same occasion were read out.
					
					 Ho Jong Man made a congratulatory speech to be followed by speeches by people's artiste and composer of the Kumgang-san Opera Troupe Jong Sang Jin and merited artiste Kim Myong Hui.
					
					 A letter to Marshal Kim Jong Un was read out at the meeting.
					
					 Then followed a congratulatory reception.

articles.title: Korean Nation-First Spirit Is Powerful Weapon for Building Thriving Nation: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Korean Nation-First Spirit Is Powerful Weapon for Building Thriving Nation: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, December 28 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Sunday dedicates an article to the 25th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's work "Let Us Give Full Play to the Korean Nation-First Spirit".
					 The work, published on December 28, Juche 78 (1989), comprehensively deals with the essence and content of the Korean nation-first spirit and the tasks and ways of fully displaying it.
					
					 The work serves as a militant banner enabling the army and people of the DPRK to cherish greater pride and self-esteem as the members of Kim Il Sung's nation and to work hard for the prosperity of the country, the article says, and goes on: 
					
					 The Korean nation-first spirit is an ideological and moral source that helps strengthen the single-minded unity, the mainstay of the Korean revolution.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK have the pride and honor of living and struggling being blessed with the leaders generation after generation and herein lie the basic foundation of the Korean nation-first spirit as well as the solidity of the harmonious whole of the leader, party and masses and the might of its invincibility.
					
					 Our own way is precisely the Juche way and there is no other better way. This is the fixed faith of the Korean people.
					
					 It is their revolutionary disposition to perform steady creations and innovations by making redoubled efforts, while taking it as a shame to be left behind.
					
					 It is the national self-esteem of the army and people of the DPRK to display the staunch fighting spirit of creating things new and advanced our own way based on strong pluck that the word "impossible" is not to be found in the Korean vocabulary and by the Juche faith and will to look at the world with one's feet firmly planted on one's land. 
					
					 The Korean nation-first spirit of the army and people of the DPRK is being further displayed under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Refutes S. Korean Puppet Authorities' Anti-DPRK Accusations
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Refutes S. Korean Puppet Authorities' Anti-DPRK Accusations
Pyongyang, December 28 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet authorities recently let a spokesman for the Foreign Ministry say it is noteworthy that the U.S. described the hacking into the Sony Pictures Entertainment as an "act of the north". The spokesman supported the story spread by the American master, talking about "similar method" to what was used for cyber attack on financial institutions in south Korea in March last year.
					 The south Korean authorities are groundlessly linking the hacking into their atomic power stations with the DPRK also. The south Korean puppet minister of Justice at a recent "National Assembly" session said he does not rule out the "possibility of the north's involvement" in the information leakage from the atomic power stations. The coteries of the puppet joint investigation group justified the story of the "north's involvement", stressing that "phrases widely used in the north" were used by hackers.
					
					 Commenting on this, Rodong Sinmun Sunday dismisses the story of "north's act" touted by the south Korean puppet forces as a lie and plot aimed to justify their acts of escalating confrontation with the DPRK and to slander it.
					
					 This fully reveals the despicable nature of the group of traitors as it lets loose far-fetched accusations against its fellow countrymen while currying favor with its master pursuant to sycophancy and submission.
					
					 The group resorts to whatever means to slander the DPRK and escalate confrontation with it, thereby fostering and aggravating them. This hysterical act makes one easily guess why the north-south relations have been plunged into a deadlock as now.
					
					 The commentary notes evil acts deserve divine punishment, stressing it is the legitimate right of the DPRK to mount retaliatory attacks on those responsible for anti-DPRK conspiracy and on their bases.

articles.title: Minju Joson Condemns U.S.-South Korea "Human Rights" Racket
articles.content:
Minju Joson Condemns U.S.-South Korea "Human Rights" Racket
Pyongyang, December 28 (KCNA) -- Some days ago, "human rights" issue of the DPRK was adopted as an official agenda item to be discussed at the UN Security Council in the wake of the fabrication of the anti-DPRK "human rights resolution" at the UN General Assembly. 
					 Minju Joson Sunday in a commentary accuses the U.S. and its followers of reducing the UN to a place of breeding the anti-DPRK "human rights" plots.
					
					 The commentary says the aim of the U.S. smear "human rights" offensive is to weaken the influence of the DPRK dynamically advancing under the Songun banner, overthrow its socialist system and realize the ambition to stifle it which they failed to do by force of arms.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK hold the south Korean puppet group responsible for playing a principal role in fabricating the anti-DPRK "human rights resolution" at the UN General Assembly in collusion with the U.S. and bringing it to the UN Security Council.
					
					 Then what is the purpose of south Korean "human rights" racket against the DPRK?
					
					 It is to tarnish the image of the DPRK victoriously advancing under the guidance of Marshal Kim Jong Un and overthrow its social system in concert with the U.S.
					
					 It is also to get rid of the ruling crises caused by the vicious fascist dictatorship, confrontation with the country fellowmen and unpopular rule in south Korea including the Jong Yun Hoe's interference in the state affairs, dissolution of the Unified Progressive Party and ever-increasing anti-"government" actions.
					
					 It is a pipe dream for the south Korean puppet group to stifle the DPRK in league with the U.S.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK are fully ready to punish the south Korean puppet group which declared a "human rights war" against the DPRK.
					
					 It is the U.S. and its stooge south Korean puppet group which should be hit by hard blow of the toughest counteraction.

articles.title: U.S. Anti-DPRK "Human Rights" Racket Slammed by Koreans in China
articles.content:
U.S. Anti-DPRK "Human Rights" Racket Slammed by Koreans in China
Pyongyang, December 28 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Zhongnan Regional Association of the General Association of Koreans in China in a statement on Dec. 22 denounced the U.S. anti-DPRK "human rights" campaign.
					 The statement said that the Koreans under the association strongly denounce the U.S. for railroading the anti-DPRK "human rights resolution."
					
					 It continued:
					
					 The U.S. manipulated its supporters to make the DPRK's "human rights issue" an agenda item at the session of the UN Security Council, defying procedures and regulations of the UN, a clear proof of its political attempt to use "human rights" as a means for invasion.
					
					 The "resolution" carried such poisonous content of taking into account the issue of bringing the "human rights issue" to the International Criminal Court, a product of the U.S. despicable policy of hostility toward the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. will face a day of pricking its own eyes as it increases the danger of a war through extreme hostile policy.
					
					 Those countries which were manipulated to ram the "resolution" through the UN should come to their senses and remember the saying curses come home to roost. 
					
					 The Koreans under the association will foil the hostile forces' reckless "human rights" racket in the world eyes.

articles.title: Works of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il Posted by German Organization
articles.content:
Works of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il Posted by German Organization
Pyongyang, December 28 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung's works "On the Three Principles of National Reunification" and "10-Point Programme of the Great Unity of the Whole Nation for the Reunification of the Country" and leader Kim Jong Il's works "Let Us Carry Out the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung's Instructions for National Reunification", "Let Us Reunify the Country Independently and Peacefully through the Great Unity of the Entire Nation" and "Let Us Struggle Resolutely to Implement the Three Principles of National Reunification" were posted by the Anti-Imperialist Forum of Germany on its website on Dec. 19.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Venezuela
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Venezuela
Pyongyang, December 28 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il's work "Respecting the Forerunners of the Revolution Is a Noble Moral Obligation of Revolutionaries" was brought out in booklet by a publishing house in Venezuela on Dec. 20.
					 The work, published on Dec. 25, Juche 84 (1995), deals with the idea that respecting the forerunners of the revolution is a requirement of the revolution and indicates the principled matters arising in establishing the moral trait of respecting the forerunners of the revolution and in developing the noble moral obligation among people.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Remembered in Different Countries
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Remembered in Different Countries
Pyongyang, December 28 (KCNA) -- Meetings, photo and book exhibitions and film shows took place in Russia, DR Congo, Congo, Uganda and Angola from Dec. 15 to 18 on the occasion of the third anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Displayed at the venues of the events were photos documenting his Songun revolutionary leadership feats.
					
					 Also displayed were photos and books introducing Songun Korea.
					
					 Film shown included Korean films "Fireworks of a Thriving Nation" and "Okryu Children's Hospital".
					
					 The secretary of the Khabarovsk Territorial Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation in a speech said that Kim Jong Il formulated the Juche idea as Kimilsungism, applied it to the revolution and construction and developed the DPRK into the powerful socialist state.
					
					 The acting general secretary of the People's Party for the Reconstruction and Democracy of DR Congo noted that Kim Jong Il strengthened the Workers' Party of Korea into the party of President Kim Il Sung and the people's party deeply rooted among the masses, providing a large flower garden of the single-minded unity of the leader, the party and the masses in Korea.
					
					 The deputy general secretary of the Central Committee of the Congolese Party of Labor said: Kim Jong Il performed the undying feats on behalf of the Korean people and other progressives. The DPRK has turned into a country that manufactures and launches satellites, and into a nuclear power thanks to his wise guidance and devoted efforts.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Praised by Foreign Media
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Praised by Foreign Media
Pyongyang, December 28 (KCNA) -- Foreign media dedicated special write-ups to the third anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 They carried photos of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, portraits of smiling Kim Jong Il and his photos and those of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The Russian paper Komsomolskaya Pravda on Dec. 17 in an article praised Kim Jong Il as the rare Songun brilliant commander possessed of extraordinary military stratagem and matchless grit.
					
					 The 48th issue of the Russian paper Veteran in an article titled "Comrade Kim Jong Il and modern Korea" lauded him for remarkably strengthening the politico-ideological and military might of the country and providing the firm foundation for building an economic power.
					
					 The British paper The New Worker on Dec. 12 in an article titled "Kim Jong Il, defender of socialism" praised his ideological and theoretical and leadership feats, distinguished inborn disposition and noble virtues as an illustrious commander.
					
					 The Uruguayan paper La Juventud on Dec. 16 said that over the past three years after his demise the Korean people have glorified his idea and feats with invariable loyalty and noble sense of moral obligation for him.
					
					 The Mexican paper Unidad Nacional on Dec. 15 noted that the army and people of the DPRK have made achievements to translate into a brilliant reality his plan and desire for building a thriving nation, upholding him as the eternal chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Praised by Foreign Media
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Praised by Foreign Media
Pyongyang, December 28 (KCNA) -- Syrian papers dedicated articles to the third anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Al Baath and other papers on Dec. 15 and 17 in their articles noted that the Korean people have added shine to the idea and exploits of Kim Jong Il for the past three years since his demise.
					
					 They gave detailed accounts of the fact that seeds for prosperity sown by him are bearing fruits as a stirring reality in the DPRK.
					
					 Al Thawrah on Dec.17 in an article titled "People's Korea marks third anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il" said the world progressives are praising him as a great man and prominent thinker and theoretician.
					
					 It lauded him as a peerless elder statesman who made great contributions to the global cause of independence.
					
					 He is always remembered by the Korean people and other world progressives for his great revolutionary idea and undying exploits, it said.
					
					 Al Nour on Dec. 17 carried an article titled "On occasion of third anniversary of demise of the great leader Comrade Kim Jong Il, general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea".
					
					 Noting that the idea and theory of the great man serve as the immutable truth and banner of victory for the Workers' Party of Korea and the Korean people, it introduced the history of his leadership over the party.

articles.title: Internet Seminar on Kim Jong Il's Feats Held
articles.content:
Internet Seminar on Kim Jong Il's Feats Held
Pyongyang, December 28 (KCNA) -- An internet seminar of the Asia-Pacific region on leader Kim Jong Il's undying feats took place under the sponsorship of the Asia-Pacific regional committee for honoring the memory of him on Dec. 17.
					 Portraits of smiling President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il were displayed in the front wall of the seminar venue in Karachi, Pakistan and floral baskets were placed before the portraits.
					
					 Also on display were photos showing the noble revolutionary career and feats of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 In addition, books and photos introducing Songun Korea were on show there.
					
					 The main seminar was attended by Pakistani personages from all social strata.
					
					 The participants observed a moment's silence in honor of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Read out at the seminar was a message from ex-Prime Minister of Nepal Madav Kumar Nepal.
					
					 Then, speeches were made under the titles of "In honor of leader Kim Jong Il", "HE Kim Jong Il and Songun leadership" and "HE Kim Jong Il will live forever" by nearly 30 personages from all walks of life and chiefs of the organizations for friendship and solidarity with the Korean people and the Juche idea study groups and personages of the Asia-Pacific regional committee for honoring the memory of Kim Jong Il and the Asia-Pacific Regional Committee for Supporting Peaceful Reunification of Korea, from 15 countries.
					
					 A letter to supreme leader Kim Jong Un was adopted at the seminar.
					
					 An appeal to the world progressives was also adopted.
					
					 The appeal said that Kim Jong Il was an outstanding thinker and theoretician, a great statesman, a gifted Songun brilliant commander and a benevolent father of the people who made undying contributions to the building of strong and prosperous Korea and the accomplishment of the global cause of independence.
					
					 The appeal called for continuing to vigorously conduct various activities for praising him on a national, regional and international scale, for giving wide publicity to successes gained by the Korean people in their struggle and for sending invariable support and solidarity to them.

articles.title: DPRK Film Shows Remember Kim Jong Il Abroad
articles.content:
DPRK Film Shows Remember Kim Jong Il Abroad
Pyongyang, December 28 (KCNA) -- Film shows were held by the Mexican National Coordinating Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, the General Union of the Algerian Workers, a farm in Nasarawa State, Nigeria, MKP Hospital in Zambia and a Thai company from Dec. 8 to 15 on the occasion of the third anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Films deal with his revolutionary life and exploits.

articles.title: Demise Anniversary of Kim Jong Il Commemorated Abroad
articles.content:
Demise Anniversary of Kim Jong Il Commemorated Abroad
Pyongyang, December 28 (KCNA) -- Events took place at DPRK missions in foreign countries on the occasion of the third anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 They included memorial meetings, Kimjongilia exhibitions, round-table talks, photo and book exhibitions and film shows in Nakhodka, Russia, India, Pakistan, Thailand, Uzbekistan, France, Italy, Senegal, Libya and Peru from Dec. 13 to 17.
					
					 On display at the venues of the events were photos on the exploits of President Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also displayed were their works, famous flower Kimjongilias and publications introducing Songun Korea.
					
					 Films shown included the Korean films "Reply of Korea" and "Fireworks of a Thriving Nation."
					
					 The participants laid floral baskets and bouquets before the portraits of smiling Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and full-length painting depicting them and paid homage to them.
					
					 The vice mayor of Nakhodka said the undying exploits Kim Jong Il performed for the prosperity of the DPRK and the development of the Russia-DPRK relations would always be remembered by not only the Korean people but also the Russian people.
					
					 Indian personages lauded Kim Jong Il for formulating the Songun politics as the basic political mode under socialism. 
					
					 A political assistant to the chairman of the People's Party of Pakistan praised him as the leader of not only the DPRK but also the world.
					
					 A director of the European Society for the Study of the Juche Idea said Kim Jong Il turned the DPRK into a political and ideological power and a military power that no force dares provoke.
					
					 A political adviser to the president of Senegal spoke highly of Kim Jong Il, calling him not only the eternal leader of the Korean people but the greatest man praised by other progressives in the world.
					
					 The international secretary of the Communist Party of Peru (Red Motherland) said Kim Jong Il would always be remembered by not only the Korean people but also other people.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Receives Letter from Participants in Internet Seminar
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Receives Letter from Participants in Internet Seminar
Pyongyang, December 28 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a letter from the participants in an internet seminar of the Asian-Pacific region on immortal exploits of leader Kim Jong Il on Dec. 17.
					 The letter lauded Kim Jong Il as a peerless patriot who developed the DPRK into an invincible power dignified with independence and as a world political elder who made undying contributions to accomplishing the global cause of independence.
					
					 It stressed that it is the most prominent exploit unprecedented in the history of human politics that Kim Jong Il dynamically advanced the global cause of independence for world peace and justice.
					
					 It noted that they would invariably continue to support the Korean people in their struggle for building a thriving nation and realizing the independent and peaceful reunification of the country and keep holding aloft the banner of independence against imperialism in the struggle for world peace and justice.

articles.title: British Organizations Denounce U.S. for Its Human Rights Abuses
articles.content:
British Organizations Denounce U.S. for Its Human Rights Abuses
Pyongyang, December 28 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy, the Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and the Korean Friendship Association UK released a joint statement on Dec. 13 censuring the human rights abuses of the U.S.
					 The statement said:
					
					 The U.S. has peddled the non-existent "human rights issue" of the DPRK.
					
					 But the report released by the U.S. Congress disclosed that the U.S. has long systematically violated human rights even in other countries.
					
					 The U.S., styling itself the "international human rights judge", had better settle its massive human rights issue, instead of accusing other countries of their human rights performance.
					
					 All the brutal and medieval tortures perpetrated by the U.S. put even the Nazis ruffians into the shade.
					
					 The U.S. is the worst human rights abuser in the world.
					
					 It is just the U.S. that should be punished for its human rights abuses.
					
					 Washington should confess its crimes before the International Criminal Court and the UN.
					
					 The UN Security Council would be well advised to take steps to cope with the U.S. human rights abuses.
					
					 The world progressive should struggle against the U.S. human rights abuses.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un participa en ceremonia de premiacion estatal
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un participa en ceremonia de premiacion estatal
Pyongyang, 28 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 27 la ceremonia de premiacion del partido y el estado a los ejemplares funcionarios y benemeritos de intendencia de la rama pesquera del Ejercito Popular de Corea bajo la presencia del Mariscal Kim Jong Un.
					Antes del acto, el Mariscal pronuncio un discurso.
					
					El felicito a los participantes quienes van a recibir tal premiacion digna en la sede del Comite Central del Partido en medio de la esperanza, interes y la envidia de todos los sectores y unidades del pais entero.
					
					Dijo que los funcionarios y pesqueros de la rama pesquera del EPC, en acato al llamamiento combativo del partido de convertir el mar de la patria socialista en un tesoro, sobrecumplieron la tarea de captura de peces para el ano en curso presentada por el partido confiando siempre al partido y no haciendo caso a rigurosas condiciones maritimas.
					
					Anadio que esta vez la rama pesquera del EPC dio un golpe ideologico a los derrotistas que se quejaban de tales y cuales condiciones diciendo que no son abundantes peces en el mar de nuestro pais.
					
					El Mariscal presento la meta de captura de peces a ser cumplida el ano proximo por la rama pesquera del EPC y las tareas que se presentan en preparar con firmeza los cimientos material-tecnicos de las empresas pesqueras.
					
					Les rogo transmitir sin falta su saludo de felicidad a todos los funcionarios, empleados y familiares de la rama pesquera del EPC.
					
					El general de ejercito de las fuerzas terrestres Hyon Yong Chol, ministro de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares, dio lectura al decreto del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la RPDC de otorgar la premiacion del partido y el Estado a los funcionarios ejemplares de la rama pesquera y otros benemeritos de intendencia del EPC.
					
					El Mariscal confirio en persona la premiacion  del partido y el estado a ellos.
					
					Acto seguido, tomo una foto de recuerdo junto con los participantes tomando como fondo la sede del CC del PTC.
					
					Le acompanaron Hwang Pyong So, Hyon Yong Chol, So Hong Chan, Pak Yong Sik, Ryom Chol Song, Jo Kyong Chol y otros miembros ejecutivos del Comite del EPC del PTC e integrantes de mando de tipo de ejercito y a nivel de cuerpo.
